pullrequest.title: MassMatrix3::PrincipalMoments, diagonalizing the moment of inertia matrix

content.raw: I've [already written the code for the eigenvectors](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/branches/compare/mass_matrix%0Dign-math2#Linclude/ignition/math/MassMatrix3.hhT379) based on this same paper; I'm just saving it for the next pull request. Since a real symmetric has orthogonal eigenvectors that can be represented with a rotation matrix, the "eigenvector method" computes a quaternion that can be easily converted to a rotation matrix.
